parameter.name: Repeat 1

block.name: Search Secondary and Clearing Company Balancing Options

if.findElement: //table[@summary='Create Additional Intercompany Balancing and Clearing Options']/..[text()='No data to display.']

then.findElement: (//table[@summary='Create Additional Intercompany Balancing and Clearing Options']//tr//td)[1]

executeBlock.name: Create Additional Intercompany Balancing and Clearing Options

if.findElement: //tr[td/span/span[text()=''] and td/span/span[text()=''] and td/span/span[text()=''] and td[@title=''] and td[@title=''] and td/span/span[text()='']]

then.findElement: //tr[td/span/span[text()=''] and td/span/span[text()=''] and td/span/span[text()=''] and td[@title=''] and td[@title=''] and td/span/span[text()='']]

executeBlock.name: Update Secondary and Clearing Company Balancing Options

if.findElement: //tr[td/span/span[text()=''] and td/span/span[text()=''] and td/span/span[text()=''] and td//span[text()=''] and td//span[text()=''] and td/span/span[text()='']]

then.findElement: //tr[td/span/span[text()=''] and td/span/span[text()=''] and td/span/span[text()=''] and td//span[text()=''] and td//span[text()=''] and td/span/span[text()='']]

executeBlock.name: Update Secondary and Clearing Company Balancing Options

if.findElement: //tr[td/span/span[text()=''] and td/span/span[text()=''] and td/span/span[text()=''] and td//span[text()=''] and td//span[text()=''] and td//label[text()='Start Date']/..//input[@value='']]

then.findElement: //tr[td/span/span[text()=''] and td/span/span[text()=''] and td/span/span[text()=''] and td//span[text()=''] and td//span[text()=''] and td//label[text()='Start Date']/..//input[@value='']]

executeBlock.name: Update Secondary and Clearing Company Balancing Options

else.findElement: (//table[@summary='Create Additional Intercompany Balancing and Clearing Options']//tr//td)[1]

executeBlock.name: Create Additional Intercompany Balancing and Clearing Options

error.message: 'Ledger','Source','Category','Receivables Account','Payables Account' and 'Start Date' are required. Please check the data, some of them is missing.

block.name: Create Additional Intercompany Balancing and Clearing Options
block.findElement: (//table[@summary='Create Additional Intercompany Balancing and Clearing Options']//tr[contains(@class,'Select')]//td[string(//span[text()='Receivables Account']/../..//@_d_index)+0])[1]//a

error.message: Receivables Account doesn't exist. Please check your data

block.findElement: (//table[@summary='Create Additional Intercompany Balancing and Clearing Options']//tr[contains(@class,'Select')]//td[string(//span[text()='Payables Account']/../..//@_d_index)+0])//a

error.message: Payables Account doesn't exist. Please check your data

block.findElement: //table[@summary='Create Additional Intercompany Balancing and Clearing Options']//tr[contains(@class,'Select')]//label[text()='Start Date']/../input

then.findElement: //table[@summary='Create Additional Intercompany Balancing and Clearing Options']//tr[contains(@class,'Select')]//label[text()='End Date']/../input

block.name: Update Secondary and Clearing Company Balancing Options

if.findElement: //table[@summary='Manage Secondary and Clearing Company Balancing Options - Search Results']//tr[contains(@class,'Select')]//label[text()='End Date']/../input[@value='']

else.findElement: //table[@summary='Manage Secondary and Clearing Company Balancing Options - Search Results']//tr[contains(@class,'Select')]//label[text()='End Date']/../input

executeBlock.name: Search Secondary and Clearing Company Balancing Options
